typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,
		PotentielP1N as string,
		PotentielP2N as string,
		PotentielP3N as string,
		PotentielP4N as string,
		PotentielP5N as string,
		PotentielP6N as string,
		{Date de validité} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offreDiffusInput
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix client} as string,
		{Prix négoce} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Typologie projet} as string,
		DateValidite as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> offreChantierInput
source(output(
		ATC as string,
		NomATC2 as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		NomATC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> referentielATCinput
Filter1 derive(Canal = "Diffus") ~> canalDiffus
canalDiffus select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		CodeATC,
		canal = Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoiceDiffus
columnsChoiceDiffus derive({Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité}),
		CodeATC = toDouble(CodeATC),
		DateOffre = toDate(DateOffre,"yyyy-mm-dd")) ~> typeCast
Filter2 derive(Canal = "Chantier") ~> canalChantier
canalChantier select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		NbLogement,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		Produit,
		{Quantité},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		{Créateur offre},
		Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnsChoiceChantier
columnsChoiceChantier derive(DateOffre = toDate(DateOffre,"yyyy-mm-dd"),
		Source = "file1",
		UserLowerCase = lower(Responsable),
		NbLogement = toDouble(NbLogement),
		{Quantité} = toDouble({Quantité}),
		{Numéro interne 2} = toDouble({Numéro interne 2})) ~> typeCastChantier
referentielATCinput select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(DR = toDouble(DR),
		NomATC = lower(NomATC),
		Source = "file2") ~> typeCastATC
typeCastChantier derive(Produit = replace(Produit, '"', "")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Produit = replace(Produit, "'", " ")) ~> DerivedColumn2
offreDiffusInput filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter1
offreChantierInput filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter2
canalDiffus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['STG_OFFRE_DIFFUS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stagingDiffus
canalChantier sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['STG_OFFRE_CHANTIER.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> stagingChantier
typeCastATC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['refATC2021Offre.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outTemp
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['offreChantierTemp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
typeCast sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['offreDiffusTemp.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
